text: "Road to Nowhere" is a 1985 song by new wave Talking Heads and is the second single from their sixth studio album Little Creatures. It went to number 6 in the United Kingdom, Germany, Ireland and South Africa, number 5 in New Zealand and number 8 in the Netherlands. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Talking Heads songs
title: Road to Nowhere
